data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.1.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2 PB 2
data.actual_result: When clicking on the invite there will be an infinitely loading state.
data.expected_result: You should get the option to join the server or open the server when you are already a member.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on any direct invite link to any server - Observe it
